author: Upper Echelon
description:
In a truly stunning display of both predatory behavior, and subsequent community support, the crypto world has come together in order to support a cancer patient, who was maliciously robbed by malware hidden inside a seemingly innocent game on the Steam Marketplace. 

Titled "BlockBlasters" the game was disguised as a play to earn offering with hundreds of reviews, and fabricated social media chatter in a way that made it a dangerous imposter in the video game ecosystem. 

Far from the only example, its a reminder that even when a platform is largely trusted, the programs hosted on that platform are not. 



Rasta GOFUNDME: https://www.gofundme.com/f/57p5a-help-me-beat-stage-4-cancer

title: The Malware Disaster on Steam
